features.name: Order
features.desc: A character must choose one Hellknight order to join at 1st level. The choice of order determines what disciplines the character gains later access to.

features.name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
features.desc: A Hellknight signifer gains proficiency with heavy armor.

features.name: Hellknight signifer spellcasting
features.desc: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Hellknight signifer gains new {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Hellknight signifer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.

features.name: Arcane Armor Expertise
features.desc: At 2nd level, if a Hellknight signifer has the Arcane Armor Training {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, he gains Arcane Armor Mastery as a bonus feat.

features.name: Signifer Armor Training
features.desc:
At 3rd level, while a Hellknight signifer wears armor, he reduces the armor {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} by 1 (to a minimum of 0), and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g} by 5%.
At 8th level, he reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}armor check penalty{/g} by an additional 1, and reduces his arcane {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} failure by an additional 5%.
Additionally, a Hellknight signifer's {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is not reduced by wearing medium or heavy armor.

features.name: Assiduous Gaze
features.desc:
At 4th level a Hellknight signifer gains the assiduous gaze ability. He can use it for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} once per day. He gains the benefits of True Seeing for the duration.
At 7th level, a Hellknight signifer can use this ability two times per day.

features.name: Discern Lies
features.desc: At 6th level, a Hellknight signifer gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of Illusion school.

features.name: Infernal Resilience
features.desc: At 9th level, a Hellknight signifer gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/chaotic and becomes immune to poison.

features.name: Diabolic Harbinger
features.desc: At 10th level, while wearing his signifer mask, a Hellknight signifer is immune to blindness, gazes and vision-based effects and gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
